scripts.gen:secret:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');const crypto=require('crypto');const path='.env';const key='JWT_AUTH_KEY='+crypto.randomBytes(32).toString('hex');let env='';try{env=fs.readFileSync(path,'utf8');}catch{}if(env.includes('JWT_AUTH_KEY=')){env=env.replace(/JWT_AUTH_KEY=.*/,'');}env+='
'+key+'
';fs.writeFileSync(path,env.trim()+'
');console.log('âœ… JWT_AUTH_KEY updated in .env');"
